timeline.bodyText: So it wasn't directly obvious to me what this did, and I had to check the code. I think a comment about why this is done would be great. AFAICS, this limits the size of Strings that are considered for this optimization from 512 chars to 16 chars, and so the number of calls to String.getBytes get fewer, and hence fewer allocations of byte[].
